name: easyflow-dashboard
buildCommand: node -e "if (process.env.VERCEL_ENV === 'production' && process.env.VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF === 'dev') { console.error('‚ùå ERROR: Production deployments from dev branch are BLOCKED. Change Vercel Production Branch to main in dashboard.'); process.exit(1); }" && DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true npm run build
